definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Impf. 1 pl. [[נִדְנּׁל]] Ps 20:6 (Gr Che [[נׇגִיל]]; Bi [[נְגַדֵּל]], after LXX SyrVer; Now [[נִגְדַּל]]; poss. [[נַגְדִּל]] ?) set up standard in battle, cf. Dl:Pr 61.

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: Pt. fpl. [[נִדְגׇּלוֹת]] Ct So 6:4, So 6:10 bannered, supplied with standards, pt. as subst., of bannered hosts, cf. De.
